titleStmt.title: Schism dispach't or A rejoynder to the replies of Dr. Hammond and the Ld of Derry.
titleStmt.author: Sergeant, John, 1622-1707.

notesStmt.note: A reply to "A reply to the Catholick gentlemans answer to the most materiall parts of the booke Of schisme" by Henry Hammond and "A replication to the Bishop of Chalcedon his Survey of the Vindication of the Church of England from criminous schism" by John Bramhall.
Place of publication suggested by Wing.
With a postscript leaf followed by a blank and an index.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
